name: PreAlpha-Movement-Mechanics
description:
PLEASE RUN IN FULLSCREEN

Hey, I am working on a platformer and have created a sandbox version for movement optimization. This sandbox version allows you to customize the movement according to your wishes. You can adjust the running speed on the ground, the speed of movement in the air or even the number of jumps. 

If you want to support me and think that your settings are the most optimal and feel good then I am more than grateful!

If you are satisfied with your settings, click the "Copy to clipboard" button and the settings will be copied to your clipboard. Now add what you copied from your clipboard as a comment to the comment section. With Ctrl+V or right click and paste, you can share the settings in the comment section.

Thank you in advance and have a great day!
